thread.title: Two separate weekends in London amazing suites!!!
thread.title_full: Two separate weekends in London amazing suites!!! - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TravelFamily11
title: Two separate weekends in London amazing suites!!!
text: Booking was for two separate weekends in the suites - both rooms were very different but each amazing in its own way. Room 259 and 257!!!! The chamber room access via the cross over bridge is nice and tea time was lovely...
